education.name: YouTube
education.desc: Streamed online gaming on YouTube,Twitch and Tiktok.

testimonials.title: Ayesha Galant
testimonials.desc: Ridhaa Gabier is an exceptional individual who embodies both kindness and hard work. He consistently go above and beyond in his tasks with attention to detail and dedication. His genuine care for others makes them a joyful to work with and be around. I highly recommend Ridhaa for any endeavor he pursue.

testimonials.title: Imtiyaaz Damon
testimonials.desc: Ridhaa is a friendly and understanding individual who approaches tasks with a thorough understanding. He excels in web design, ensuring that his work is of the highest quality possible. Ridhaa's commitment to comprehending and delivering excellence makes him a valuable asset in his field.

testimonials.title: Abdoel Samaai
testimonials.desc: Ridhaa is a very hardworking and dedicated person. He doesn't give up as easy as everyone else. Every goal that he has set for himself, he has achieved. His not stopping till he reaches the top. He is a motivation to everyone around him, and his personality makes others not give up and and reach their full potential.

testimonials.title: Jamie-Lee Kinnear
testimonials.desc: Ridhaa is very kind and considerate towards others. When it comes to  his work, he is incredibly hard-working, focused and determined, and more so when there are issues. I enjoy working with him. He definitely has a lot of potential and I would highly recommend him.

testimonials.title: John-Bruce Noad
testimonials.desc: Ridhaa is an exemplary software developer, seamlessly blending hard work, teamwork, and a sharp focus on delivering excellence. His expertise in frontend development, timely deliveries, and comprehensive understanding make him an invaluable asset to any project. Highly recommended.

testimonials.title: Zoe Daniels
testimonials.desc: Ridhaa is dedicated and very passionate about his work. Working together makes me motivated to go above and beyond to reach our goals and of course, having fun while doing so.
